) } formatDate = date => { const month = '' + (d.getMonth() + 1) const day = '' + d.getDate() const year = d.getFullYear() if (month.length < 2) month = '0' + month if (day.length < 2) day = '0' + day return [year, month, day].join('-') } export default Dados
